title: S2 Ep12: The Possession of Mark David Chapman - Hr.2
itunes:title: The Possession of Mark David Chapman - Hr.2
description: "Maria" continues the bizarre tale of the behavior of Mark David Chapman before the assassination of John Lennon. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey is also present. Demonologist Adam Blai also weighs in on the demonic aspect of the case in this intriguing second hour of the show!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
